name: Design Sprint
long: This UI/UX Design Hackathon is a 48-hour long creativity challenge which will allow innovative minds to use their full capabilities and imagination to create new designs and ideas for an optimal user experience. The hackathon will be drafted in such a way which will allow beginners, intermediates and experts to easily adapt to the problem provided, and will allow an overall gain in knowledge and experience of the participants in UI/UX domain.

name: AI Classico
long: A 48-hour long hackathon to bring programmers and developers together to solve some of the most pressing problems that we face in real-life. The initiative of this hackathon is to provide the AI/ML enthusiasts with a platform and an opportunity to learn, apply and showcase their AI/ML skills through the social impact challenges that will be presented to them.
